comments.content:
is there any better close-up image of the font?

I am pretty sure Yves or Mike would know this one...  
perhaps they are away on an early Easter-holiday-vacation?!?

It seems that the letterforms in [District Thin](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329014009/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/garagefonts/district_family_ot/?&sample_text=GROUND%20MAPLES&update=0) are pretty similar. I guess it could be further thinned by adding negative (white) stroke. The shapes also are close to [Interstate Thin](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329014009/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font_bureau/interstate_thin_ot/?&sample_text=GROUND%20MAPLES&update=0), which is closer to the weight here.

- Mike Yanega
